title: The Little Boy Who Cried Wolf: The Complete Story
description: We have all heard the story of the "Boy Who Cried Wolf," but do any of us know much about the boy? Do we know the influences that informed his decisions? What happened afterwards? What happened to the Wolf? These unanswered gave birth to this humorous political commentary, "The Little Boy Who Cried The Complete Story."Complete with vivid, comical illustrations, this modern retelling of a classic folktale examines the cultural influences that led the little boy to make his choices. Full of modern implications for our fractured political climate, the book pursues important topics in the fresh air of humor.
author: Kevin Cripe
